title: What’re the best exciting and angry songs? - Quora

response.answer_text:
A few angry songs here –  RATM ~ Killing in the NameFuck you, I won't do what you tell me Sex Pistols ~ BodiesFuck this and fuck that / Fuck it all and fuck a fucking brat Dead Kennedys ~ Holiday in CambodiaKiss ass while you bitch / So you can get rich NWA ~ Fuck the PoliceFuck that shit, cause I ain't the one / for a punk motherfucker with a badge and a gun Public Enemy ~ 911 is a Joke911 is a joke we don't want 'em / I call a cab cause a cab will come quicker Public Enemy ~ Welcome to the TerrordomeBeen spit in the face / But the rhymes keep fittin' Wu-Tang Clan ~ Bring Da RuckusYou wanna bring it, so fuck it / Come on and bring the ruckus Wu-Tang Clan - C.R.E.A.M.But as the world turns I learned life is Hell / Living in the world, no different from a cell Beastie Boys ~ SabotageBut make no mistakes and switch up my channel / I'm buddy rich when I fly off the handle Not an angry song, but this should be on everyone’s playlist all the same. Cypress Hill ~ Dr. Greenthumb [1:15)
Can't be growing without no permit / but fuck that, I study the 215 trip  ∞

Animals by Nickleback Thunderstruck by AC/DC Run by Pink Floyd Enter the Sandman by Metallica Alive by Pearl Jam Go by Delilah Earthquake by Labrinth ft. Tinie Tempah nsfw Lightning by The Wanted Not now John by Pink Floyd nsfw Cats in the Cradle by Ugly Kid Joe The bad touch, fire water burn, the ballad of Chasey Lane by Bloodhound Gang Look to your orb by Monster Magnet White Wedding by Billy Idol Shine by Collective Soul
